Description: Strands is looking for you!  Love the smell of fresh code in the morning? Are you a passionate and creative java software developer? Do you want to be part of a team building that customises and deliver a world class product to customers, and make projects happen?     Strands is looking for Back-end Developers! You will join our Professional Services Team and help design and develop customisations of our innovative FinTech software that enables banks to offer personalized digital banking experiences.     You will take responsibility for the delivery of sophisticated and innovative backend solutions, built in a product that is being developed by a fast-paced, dynamic, international team.     You will work with our offices – Barcelona, Miami, Buenos Aires and Kulala Lumpur – and well-known customers around the world!!     You will do things like...     Programming highly-available software and innovative functionality. Strong understanding of product development and project delivery cycles. Analyzing requirements and solutions to provide the best software experience. Troubleshooting and issue resolution. Understanding of Java server-side technologies.     You'll do it using your...     Required skills:     Very good Java- / Development-Knowledge / Best practices Some experience with Java Frameworks: JPA / Hibernate, Spring, Akka, REST, Maven,JUnit API development Linux Knowledge Shell scripting knowledge Experience in UNIX environments. Should have understanding of backend database systems (SQL and Non SQL) Exposure to data streaming technologies such as Apache Kafka, Apache Storm, Apache NiFi, Apache Spark, Apache Camel Communication skills Bachelor’s degree in engineering required Written and spoken English is a must Experience in Customer Support is a big plus        You'll love it because...  You will get:  Competitive salary Private health care insurance Subscription to unlimited online training courses by Udemy     You will have:  Flexible working hours Cutting-edge technologies     You will be able to participate in:     Company tech sessions
